results.title: Simvastatin overcomes resistance to tyrosine kinase inhibitors in patient-derived, oncogene-driven lung adenocarcinoma models.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ overcomes resistance to @GENE_TXK @GENE_7294 @@@tyrosine kinase@@@ inhibitors in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@-derived, oncogene-driven @<m>DISEASE_Adenocarcinoma_of_Lung</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000077192 @@@lung adenocarcinoma@@@ models.

results.title: Simvastatin Enhanced Anti-tumor Effects of Bevacizumab against Lung Adenocarcinoma A549 Cells via Abating HIF-1alpha-Wnt/beta-Catenin Signaling Pathway.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To determine whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ could strengthen the anti-@DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ activity of @CHEMICAL_Bevacizumab @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068258 @@@bevacizumab@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Adenocarcinoma_of_Lung</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000077192 @@@lung adenocarcinoma@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin prevents proliferation and bone metastases of lung adenocarcinoma in vitro and in vivo.

results.title: Statins may have double-edged effects in patients with lung adenocarcinoma after lung resection
results.text_hl: Materials and methods: Morphological changes were evaluated and EMT markers (@GENE_CDH1 @GENE_999 @@@E-cadherin@@@, @GENE_VIM @GENE_7431 @@@vimentin@@@) were analyzed by Western blotting in @GENE_TP53 @GENE_7157 @@@p53@@@-overexpressing @CELLLINE_CVCL:1483 @@@H1650@@@ and mutant @GENE_TP53 @GENE_7157 @@@p53@@@-harboring @CELLLINE_CVCL:1511 @@@H1975@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Adenocarcinoma_of_Lung</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000077192 @@@lung adenocarcinoma@@@ cells, with and without @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ administration.

citations.NLM: Nishikawa S, Menju T, Takahashi K, Miyata R, Chen-Yoshikawa TF, Sonobe M, Yoshizawa A, Sabe H, Sato T, Date H. Statins may have double-edged effects in patients with lung adenocarcinoma after lung resection Cancer Manag Res. 2019;11():3419-3432. PMID: 31114376

results.title: Statin-dependent modulation of mitochondrial metabolism in cancer cells is independent of cholesterol content.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@Lovastatin@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@LOV@@@) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@) increased DeltaPsi in @CELLLINE_CVCL:0027 @@@HepG2@@@ and @CELLLINE_CVCL:0336 @@@Huh7@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ hepatocarcinoma cells and @CELLLINE_CVCL:1269 @@@HCC4006@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Adenocarcinoma_of_Lung</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000077192 @@@lung adenocarcinoma@@@ cells.

citations.NLM: Christie CF, Fang D, Hunt EG, Morris ME, Rovini A, Heslop KA, Beeson GC, Beeson CC, Maldonado EN. Statin-dependent modulation of mitochondrial metabolism in cancer cells is independent of cholesterol content. FASEB J. 2019 Jul;33(7):8186-8201. PMID: 30951369

results.title: Mevalonate Cascade Inhibition by Simvastatin Induces the Intrinsic Apoptosis Pathway via Depletion of Isoprenoids in Tumor Cells
results.text_hl: We confirmed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ caused the translocation of the small Rho GTPases @GENE_RHOA @GENE_387 @@@RhoA@@@, @GENE_CDC42 @GENE_998 @@@Cdc42@@@, and Rac1/2/3 from cell membranes to the cytosol in @CELLLINE_CVCL:0021 @@@U251@@@ (@DISEASE_Glioblastoma @DISEASE_MESH:D005909 @@@glioblastoma@@@), @CELLLINE_CVCL:0023 @@@A549@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Adenocarcinoma_of_Lung</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000077192 @@@lung adenocarcinoma@@@) and @CELLLINE_CVCL:0062 @@@MDA-MB-231@@@(@DISEASE_Breast_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D001943 @@@breast cancer@@@).

citations.NLM: Alizadeh J, Zeki AA, Mirzaei N, Tewary S, Rezaei Moghadam A, Glogowska A, Nagakannan P, Eftekharpour E, Wiechec E, Gordon JW, Xu FY, Field JT, Yoneda KY, Kenyon NJ, Hashemi M, Hatch GM, Hombach-Klonisch S, Klonisch T, Ghavami S.
